#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAX 10001
#define getchar_unlocked getchar
#define INF 9999999
using namespace std;
int P[MAX],W[MAX];
int table[510][MAX];
inline int next_int() {
 int n = 0;
 char c = getchar_unlocked();
 while (!('0' <= c && c <= '9')) {
  c = getchar_unlocked();
 }
 while ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
  n = n * 10 + c - '0';
  c = getchar_unlocked();
 }
 return n;
}
int sum_dp(int n,int wt)
{
    int i=0,j=0;
    for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
        for(j=0;j<=wt;j++)
        table[i][j]=0;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=wt;j++)
            {
                if(i==1 and j-W[i]>=0)
                    {
                        table[i][j]=table[i][j-W[i]]+P[i];
                        continue;
                    }
                if(i==1 and j-W[i]<0)
                {
                    table[i][j]=INF;
                    continue;
                }
                if(j-W[i]>=0)
                    {
                        table[i][j]=min(table[i][j-W[i]]+P[i],table[i-1][j]);
                    }
                else
                    {
                        table[i][j]=table[i-1][j];
                    }
            }
        }
    return table[n][wt];
}
int main(void)
{
    int T=0,i=0,E=0,F=0,n=0;
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif // ONLINE_JUDGE
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
        {
            E=next_int();
            F=next_int();
            n=next_int();
            for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
                {
                    P[i]=next_int();
                    W[i]=next_int();
                }
            int x=sum_dp(n,F-E);
            if(x>=INF)
                printf("This is impossible.\n");
            else
                {
                    printf ("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",x);
                }
        }
    return 0;
}
